bbf01d37-2849-482b-a93b-afb2fbbf8f44:
The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, or at their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} they will spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move as close as possible toward the psyker. They can act as normal, but all their MP are spent on moving toward the psyker.
At the end of their turn, the target must make the Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} again, otherwise they remain under this effect.
